comment: Smoother than Jack. Very good flavor

Prefer neat

Nose: vanilla, leather
Taste: slightly warm, caramel, peppercorn finish
Light and spicy with a sweet front and spicy finish

Caramel, green apple and vanilla are dominant notes. Hay, orange peel and mint are secondary notes. 

Caramel, orange and licorice on the pallet with a long, crisp finish

Not a bad price on a 10 year but definitely not as complex as most 10 years or older I've tried. Very sweet vanilla, caramel, and a hint of cherry nose and a bit smokey. Sweet to taste but definitely light with little to no burn going down. Decent choice for a dessert bourbon.
